## Key Collaborators

I work within a broad collaborative network across the University of Alberta, Alberta Health Services, and national and international partners.

### Institutional

- **College of Health Sciences** — research strategy, hub oversight, and faculty support
- **Women and Children's Health Research Institute (WCHRI)** — pediatric research infrastructure
- **Stollery Children's Hospital** — clinical programs in autonomic disorders and headache
- **Clinical Research Institute (CRI)** — institutional clinical research strategy

### Provincial & National

- **NACTRC** — Northern Alberta Clinical Trials and Research Centre
- **ACRC** — Alberta Clinical Research Consortium
- **CANTRAIN** — Canadian clinical trials training network
- **RareKidsCan** — National rare pediatric diseases research network
- **CIHR College of Reviewers** — national peer review

### International

- **APRU** — Asia-Pacific Research Universities network
- **University of Queensland** — collaborative research partnership
- **University of Pennsylvania** — proton beam therapy partnership
